abstract: Struggle unfolding at Huaxing World Famous Garden, gated, suburban-style community on outskirts of Beijing, differs from most of the redevelopment battles that each year lead to forced evictions in that the residents are by and large middle class and privileged and the houses are relatively new; clash seems to suggest a new wrinkle in seemingly ubiquitous fights over land, many of which have inspired protests, riots and group petitioning.
snippet: The struggle for Huaxiang World Famous Garden, a gated community near the capital, is not like most of the redevelopment battles that each year lead to forced evictions in China.
lead_paragraph: The struggle for Huaxiang World Famous Garden, a gated community near the capital, is not like most of the redevelopment battles that each year lead to forced evictions in China.

headline.main: Harassment and Evictions Bedevil Even China’s Well-Off
headline.print_headline: Harassment and Evictions Bedevil Even China’s Well-Off
headline.seo: Harassment and Evictions Bedevil Even China’s Well-Off
